flawed_nl_solution:
Cynthia was left with 67 -13 = <<67-13=52>>52 potatoes after making wedges.
She used 52/2 = <<52/2=26>>26 potatoes to make potato chips.
Cynthia made 13 x 8 = <<13*8=104>>104 wedges.
She made 26 x 20 = <<26*20=520>>520 potato chips.
Cynthia made 520 - 104 = <<520-104=416>>416 more potato chips than wedges.
#### 416

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 54, not 52. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
